author: timbeiko
content:
Can you please stay respectful and ideally avoid cursing here. There has been extensive discussion of whether we should implement EIP-2593. Here's a good analysis: https://insights.deribit.com/market-research/analysis-of-eip-2593-escalator/

Section 9.2 here also covers it: http://timroughgarden.org/papers/eip1559.pdf

author: sky.cactus
content: It is healthier for gossip network to have it implemented at the protocol layer.  Also, hardware wallets and off chain signer wallets can't reasonably do escalator.
